tips.quote: Are you having fun? Dont forget ~ to use your gift for even more fun!
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Need something and can't get it right away? Consider spawning it yourself.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Why go around when you can just delete your way forward.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. But it can also end with a single tp.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: With your gift you can set time to be anything.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: There is more then meets the eye.Click on object to learn more about it.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Sometimes we stray off the intended course and get lost. But alas there always is a way to reset our way back home.
tips.author: Sun Tzu

tips.quote: Something take a bit long to complete? If only time could be scaled.
tips.author: Sun Tzu
